body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/api/extensions/__init__.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/2e492bc8292bdd4105e72d757453210c7a499d69/pandas/api/extensions/__init__.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/api.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/2e492bc8292bdd4105e72d757453210c7a499d69/pandas/core/api.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/categorical.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/2e492bc8292bdd4105e72d757453210c7a499d69/pandas/core/arrays/categorical.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/interval.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/2e492bc8292bdd4105e72d757453210c7a499d69/pandas/core/arrays/interval.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/period.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/2e492bc8292bdd4105e72d757453210c7a499d69/pandas/core/arrays/period.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/api/test_api.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/2e492bc8292bdd4105e72d757453210c7a499d69/pandas/tests/api/test_api.py) !
